dpm.content
Class EntityRelatedContentStorage

java.lang.Object
  dpm.content.EntityRelatedContentStorage
public class EntityRelatedContentStorage
extends java.lang.Object

Basic storage for a variety of items including peergroups and advertisements. Implemented as a hashmap of sorted collections. A very important part of the DPM application. Used for transient data storage.

Since:
November 17, 2003, 8:57 PM

addLinkToAllLinks

public void addLinkToAllLinks(Link link,
                              net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup parentPG)
Adds a linkAdv to where the entity is either the source or the target. This method takes care of all operations. NOTE: precedence relations (DO_BEFORE) are stored in special content storages; Tasks and Products are stored in these storages: e.g. incomingProducts stores Products OTHER relations (user definable) are stored in 'allLinks'
